channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning Professional Series on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Gaussian process and machine learning Gaussian process regression implemented only by numpy of Python
item.description: I recently read ["Gaussian Process and Machine Learning"](https://www.amazon.co.jp/GaussianProcessandMachineLearning-MachineLearningProfessionalSeries-Mochihashi-Daichi/dp/4061529269) I implemented it. The content is “3.4.2 Gaussian Process Regression Calculation” in Chapter 3. Deer is a landmark. It is easy to understand and highly recommended. What is the Gauss process? First of all, to explain the Gaussian process in one word, At Y=f(X) “If input X is similar, output Y is similar." It is a tool for mathematically expressing that property.
